entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
